name: Down From the Dream
description: A certain White fox has accidentally pulled out and transported to a Black White world called Chromonoir. To go back to their home world, they have to get to the Surface machine, where they need to explore to the deepest layer. However, the journey to the bottom is not quite easy and there are Black Glob paths and Shadow disguises that can keep them away from their goal. Can the White Fox be able to dive deeper and find the Surface before five days?
